description: Ultimate Surrender is a rough sport. It puts the bodies and minds of the wrestlers to the test. No one can hide; no one is safe. Those girls that have the courage to wrestle here have my utmost respect. Sarah puts up a valiant struggle but in the end an old injury surfaces and the match is stopped. Sarah is fine, but we are sorry to say she has decided not to wrestle anymore after this match. Ultimate surrender salutes Sarah Blake for her efforts and the beauty she brought to the site. Huzzah!
title: Sarah Blake and Isis Love
